about.title: About Loza Mount Gerizim
about.content:
Loza Mount Gerizim specializes in producing high-quality traditional food products from Har Bracha - Gerizim. We are proud to offer tahini, hummus, and olive oil produced using traditional methods while maintaining uncompromising quality.

Each product is carefully crafted using selected raw materials and preserving ancient recipes. We believe in small-scale, quality production that allows us to maintain a high level of quality in each of our products.

Our products reflect the local tradition and authenticity of the region, and are produced with respect for the environment and the local community.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.commitmentText: Loza Mount Gerizim is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying relevant accessibility standards.
